committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize the acquisition of non-Federal, public lands for Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to purchase or exchange non-Federal lands from the State or a local government for inclusion in the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore, Michigan.

titles.title: To authorize the acquisition of non-Federal, public lands for Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore.
